tutorial.speak:
Let's walk through setting up Peace Out in Lessons.Church.
First, register or login to your Lessons.Church account in a separate Google Chrome browser tab.
If you haven't already, you'll need to register your church.
Click on providers on the left side of the page.
Click the plus sign on the External Providers page.
Enter the name as "Peace Out" and for the API URL enter https://api.lessons.church/lessons/public/tree?providerId=_f9_06XVB74
Click on schedules to get back to the schedule page. From the Provider tab, you'll now be able to choose "Peace Out".
Click on the plus sign to add a new classroom.
Fill in your first classroom name.
Click save to create the classroom.
Now click on the classroom you just made.
Add a new schedule for this classroom by clicking on the plus sign.
Fill in the scheduled date, the program you want to use, the study from that program, the lesson from that study, and the venue.
Click save to create the schedule.
You can set up as many classrooms and scheduled times as you want.
If you would like to use the B1 Mobile app for teachers to view the lessons, check out our guide on how to set it up.
